description:
On the way home, B.B.B. and his friends find a little dog. They all fall in love instantly with its sad whimper, watery eyes, and wagging tail. Unable to resist its cuteness, B.B.B. names the dog Coo-chan and asks his parents if he can keep it, but his father is opposed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: かわいすぎる!?ぼくのペット
